channel.title: Update message
channel.description: I know there is a code out there so that i can type ::update (time in seconds) and it will appear in the bottom right cornor of the screen saying there will be an update in so many seconds then it logs everyone out. does anyone have this code?

item.title: Update message
item.dc:creator: @latin_king latin king
item.description:
@latin_king wrote:

i have it, you need to go inside clien.java, look for any command Example: (“Alert”), type it under that whole command. this is the command–>

    if ((playerRights >= 3) || playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Mod Steve")) {

        if (command.startsWith("update") && command.length() > 7) {
            PlayerHandler.updateSeconds = (Integer.parseInt(
                    command.substring(7))
                            + 1);
            PlayerHandler.updateAnnounced = false;
            PlayerHandler.updateRunning = true;
            PlayerHandler.updateStartTime = System.currentTimeMillis();

Read full topic
